attributes.action: Please introduce legislation to prevent the NHS being sold off in trade deals.
attributes.additional_details:
Boris Johnson has already said  “probably the entire economy” of Britain will be “on the table” if the two nations ever begin talks on a pact.

Nigel Farage (who could one day lead the country) has said we need to move to a US insurance model.

https://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/nigel-farage-nhs-might-have-to-be-replaced-by-private-health-insurance-9988904.html

https://www.politicshome.com/news/uk/foreign-affairs/news/104289/us-will-want-business-access-nhs-post-brexit-trade-deal
attributes.background:
Our NHS is the most precious thing. The US are making noises that they would want its healthcare firms to be able to bid for NHS contracts as part of a post-Brexit trade deal with the UK. 

We want it legislation that prevents whoever is running the country from selling our NHS to other countries.
